hero.title: AI Developer & Software Engineer
hero.bio: I merge expertise in artificial intelligence and web development, from data-driven models all the way to user-friendly web experiences.

intro.bioText: I combine the analytical power of artificial intelligence with the agility of web development to build projects that deliver tangible value. The insights I gain from data-driven models are brought to life through fast, modern interfaces users enjoy.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: For me, artificial intelligence is the craft of revealing the hidden potential inside data. That potential only becomes meaningful when it reaches the end user. This is why I build bridges with web technologies, translating the results of complex models into fast, intuitive, and interactive interfaces everyone can understand.
about.paragraph2: On this journey I reinforced my theoretical knowledge through hands-on, industry-leading programs. Project-based bootcamps like **Turkcell Geleceği Yazanlar** and **İBB Data Science Bootcamp** gave me the chance to prove myself while working with real-world datasets.
about.paragraph3: My guiding philosophy is to combine the strengths of both worlds so that data becomes not only understandable but also actionable. With a passion for continuous learning and tackling new challenges, I aim to bring value to every project.

steps.title: AI Intern
steps.company: BT10 Information Technologies and Consulting Ltd.
steps.description:
• Actively participated in the development of an Entity Similarity Engine project using Python and TensorFlow/Keras.
• Conducted R&D work on AI-based similarity detection using deep learning models such as MLP, Two-Tower, Bi-Encoder, and Facebook DINOv2.
• Integrated the Faiss library for vector similarity searches, enabling efficient querying of model outputs.
• Implemented traditional similarity algorithms using Python, R, and Java, and performed performance comparisons with AI-based models.

steps.title: IT Support Staff (Part-Time)
steps.description:
• Managed regular maintenance and software update processes to ensure systems in the university's computer laboratories remained stable and up-to-date.
• Provided technical support for hardware and software issues encountered by academic and administrative staff, developing problem-solving and communication skills.
• Prepared regular technical reports on operations and system inventory, establishing documentation habits.
